name: Fogpanel-admin-api-php
tagline: Simple library interface for FogPanel Admin APIs
body:
### Install API Library 
The API Library provides a wrapper for all the APIs provided by the FogPanel Admin module.

1. Download Composer:

    ```    
    curl -s https://getcomposer.org/installer | php
    ```
    
1. Add FogPanel Admin API as a dependency to your `composer.json` file:

    ```js
    {
        "require": {
            "assistanz/fogpanel-admin-api": "dev-master"
        }
    }
    ```
    
1. Install Composer:
    
    ```
    php composer.phar install
    ```
    
### How to use?
You should have API key and secret from FogPanel server. The server should be available online with active account to test.

### Authors and Contributors
The library is developed and maintained by @assistanz [AssistanZ Networks]. Active Authors

1. Sujai SD @sujaisd

1. Jamseer N @jamseer-az


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with APIs? Check out the documentation at http://www.fogpanel.com/ or contact support@fogpanel.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
